Subject: What about using the React ChartJS 2 Wrapper
MainText: If you are a React developer exploring ChartJS chances are you've found the really friendly and easy to use wrapper If you have a simple dataset with few customization tweaks it's a great solution However as your data visualization and customization needs grow the more you'll benefit from getting under the hood of ChartJS We can refer directly to the ChartJS documentation and customize as much as we need
